item.description: Havana House is a women-owned bar with a large outdoor area with tables (inside and out) dance floor,pool table, and 2 seperate rooms with couches and TV's for hanging out. Pam McAfee will be performing outside from 4:30-7:30 pm. Cover is 5:00. Smoke-Free event. Check her out at http://wwwmyspace.com.... Catering....I think so. I will update when I find out from Dawn or Cindy. Come on over and mingle with your friends and meet new friends. This venue is nice and private and very friendly!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Havana House T-Dance
